channel.title: Awesome Points
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Awesome Points" - What are you going to use your awesome points on?

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded:
Nay, nay, DevilSF. If you have that one you can buy an ugprade for cheaper, if another person has the capacity of buying an upgrade and doesn't have that Awesome Upgrade, he won't have that cheaper cost!
So the best you can have is -1 resource

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded:
soo lets get this straight…..if i have a level 3 one with (the one with reduction on upgrades)

which takes away one resource of one type (i think)

and i have 3 people with it….then 3 resources deduction?

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded: I can't confirm this, but I'm almost certain it stacks with other players' bonuses.

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded: soo if one of your clan members did the -1% up keep and you do it too is it -2% upkeep?

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded: I grabbed the Stamina (lvl 2). Saving up for Lvl 3 and then working toward Storm. If (years down the road :p ) I get more, I'm thinking the Range.

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded:
i've spent it on level 2 SCIENCE! and level 1 stamina.

i'm now saving up for level 3 SCIENCE! and level 3 MPH.

once i loop i'll probably get level 2 MPH and level or i might restat and get level 3 MPH.

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded: Nothing. I'm saving up for lvl 3 MPH, which most likely won't happen until I loop. After that I'll take a look at SCIENCE since I got a Lab Coat recently.

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded: All I've bought so far is level 3 Stamina (+90). I've still got some spare awesome, but I'm going to wait until I have enough for level 2 leves (+5), and after that I'll probably just put my stuff into upkeep and *maybe* a level 1 range, but I doubt it.

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded: I've already bought the 2nd tier storm reward, 2nd tier collection, and 1st tier stamina. Once I get the Tote and Bingo 30 people I'll save up 500k ryo and get the 3rd tier storm to catch up on favors.

item.title: Re: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded: I used mine to buy the 3 levels of the stamina. and i bought the first level of the range thing. I think im going to save up for the storm favor points now. ^_^

item.title: Awesome Points
item.content:encoded: What are you going to use your awesome points on? Some of those bonuses look really nice….
